divs: Sighting DetailsOutside smoking, seen object on numerous occasions, thought it was just a star until it starting moving in different directions, myself and daughter would like to find out what it is. Also asked neighbors if we where see this correctly and they stated the object was moving also. never lost sight.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Egg Harbor Township
There were no other sightings in Egg Harbor Township on or around December 4th 2012
